metadata.title: CVE-2012-2150 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: xfs_metadump in xfsprogs before 3.2.4 does not properly obfuscate filedata, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information byreading a generated image.

criterions.comment: xfsprogs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
